### Data Categories
Stand Count  
Height  
Canopy Percent  
Biomass  
Grain Harvest  
 
<br> 
  
Tasks are grouped into **four** 3 week blocks for the summer.  

* Growth (wk1)
  + Height, canopy, drone image(last)
* Biomass (wk2)
  + Collect plants from quadrat
* Maintenance (wk3)
  + Data and plots
